scripts.demo:start:all: concurrently "npm run demo:api" "npm run demo:vite" "npm run demo:nextjs"
scripts.demo:install: cd demos/api-server && npm install && cd ../vite-prefetch-demo && pnpm install && cd ../nextjs-prefetch-demo && pnpm install
scripts.demo:copy-sw: cd demos/vite-prefetch-demo && npm run copy-sw && cd ../nextjs-prefetch-demo && npm run copy-sw
scripts.demo:build: cd demos/vite-prefetch-demo && npm run build && cd ../nextjs-prefetch-demo && npm run build
